column5: I have ice fished belwood a few times but i am wondering if there are any burbot or lakers seems big enough for burbot not so sure about lakers if not what else is in the lake and where can i park
Better walk lightly if you're going ice fishing this week... If the lake doesn't have anywhere deeper than 80 feet I doubt there's Laker's in it.
No burbot or Lakers. Itâ€™s a reservoir lake and they drain it way down every year. The fishing sucks frankly, better lakes elsewhere
my buddies go there and get pike, perch and walleye....but it is hit and miss. From what I have seen the best fishing is far from access points...you would want a snowmobile
